name: ai-trading-journal
description: AI Trading Journal - Full Stack Application

scripts.dev: concurrently "npm run dev --prefix frontend" "npm run dev --prefix backend"
scripts.build: npm run build --prefix frontend && npm run build --prefix backend
scripts.install:all: npm install --prefix frontend && npm install --prefix backend
scripts.lint: npm run lint --prefix frontend && npm run lint --prefix backend
scripts.format: npm run format --prefix frontend && npm run format --prefix backend
